member.name: LIBRARYSAVEFLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the options for handling a name collision when saving a library.

member.name: LIBRARYSAVEFLAGS.LSF_FAILIFTHERE
member.summary: If a library with the same name already exists, the save operation fails.

member.name: LIBRARYSAVEFLAGS.LSF_OVERRIDEEXISTING
member.summary: If a library with the same name already exists, the save operation overwrites the existing library.

member.name: LIBRARYSAVEFLAGS.LSF_MAKEUNIQUENAME
member.summary: If a library with the same name already exists, the save operation generates a new, unique name for the library.
